name: Rudolf Steiner
main_interests: Metaphysics, epistemology, philosophy of science, esotericism, Christianity, Spiritual Science, Freemasonry
influences: Helena Blavatsky, Franz Brentano, Wilhelm Dilthey, Fichte, Hegel, Goethe, Nietzsche, Schiller, Schopenhauer, Immanuel Kant
influenced: Owen Barfield, Josef Beuys, Martin Buber,   Wassily Kandinsky, Albert Schweitzer, Richard Tarnas, Saul Bellow
notable_ideas: Anthroposophy, Anthroposophical Medicine, Biodynamic Agriculture, Eurythmy, Spiritual Science, Waldorf Education, holism, Holism in science
